entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IntelliSense loses track of types of variables #75652
  • completion make it hard to use an undeclared generic type parameter as return value #75651
    17.13

Closed

  • Symbols not published for 4.11.0 #75407
    17.12
  • Error when opening Intellisense suggestion to resolve CA2012 #66726
    17.8
  • Pull method up to interface doesn't show interface name when method name is too long (matters when multiple interfaces) #70316
  • Intellisence ignores protected accessibility for constructor in derived classes #70235
    Backlog
  • [return: NotNullIfNotNull(nameof(arg))] should apply to T with async Task<T> methods #67939
    17.9

PullRequests

Created

  • Ensure discards are initially soft selected in VSCode #75655
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Reduce allocations in VirtualCharService.CreateVirtualCharSequence #75654
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Workaround for binding redirect generation issue #75653
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Remove redundant IsMono #75649
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • update configs for 17.13p2 snap #75650
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Add tests for `unmanaged` constraint #75629
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix ref analysis of self-assignment #75618
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Fix ref safety analysis of captured locals #75627
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Ref safety: replace uint scope with struct Lifetime #75647
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update VSSDK and Gladstone versions #75594
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Adjust `ContainingSymbol` for substituted local function #75636
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.12
  • Fix generate type dialog invoked on type argument in a base list #63378
    Area-IDE, Community, VSCode
